description: Episode of Series "The Human Body". Show the relationship between nutrition and metabolism. Demonstrates that a balanced diet produces the proper amounts of energy producing foods and essential chemicals needed for body building, and tells why each food type yields the quantity of calories it does. Show how people performing different activities require varied calorie consumption, through the use of animation, diagrams, and live action application in practical situations. No other credits available.
